General.Name: Shenzhen Gas Corp Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen Gas Corporation Ltd. provides urban gas, natural gas, and LPG energy. The company operates through four segments: City Gas, Gas Resources, Comprehensive Energy, and Smart Service. It serves 5.74 million piped natural gas customers approximately through 8,000 kilometers of gas pipelines in Shenzhen; and operates 23 natural gas refueling stations, 2 liquefied petroleum gas storage and distribution filling stations, and 46 direct sales stores. The company also engages in the liquefied petroleum gas wholesale business through a network of 80,000 cubic meters. In addition, it engages in natural gas thermal power business; promotes distributed integrated energy solutions; develops integrated energy supply; and research and development, and production of gas appliances and other ancillary equipment, and gas metering equipment, with metering technology, safety technology, and Internet of Things technology, as well as supply of daily necessities for residents. Shenzhen Gas Corporation Ltd. was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
